title: What Happened to the Wonder Woman Game?!
description:
Greg is hearing not so great things about Wonder Woman. Will we see it at SGF? 
From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2kJQjUgT_QY 

Download Vampire Survivors on Switch, PC, Xbox, and Mobile RIGHT NOW! PlayStation coming soon!


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
